context_of_use: The customer wants to add selected products to the shopping cart for later purchase.
stakeholders_and_interests: customer: The customer wants to purchase multiple items at once.
description: This use case allows the customer to add selected products to the shopping cart for later purchase.
triggering_event: The customer selects a product to add to the cart.
preconditions: The customer is logged into the system.
The product is available for purchase.
postconditions: The selected product is added to the customer's shopping cart.
assumptions: The customer has a valid account to log in.
requirements_met: The system shall allow customers to add products to their cart.
main_flow: 1. The customer selects a product → The system displays the product details.
2. The customer clicks 'Add to Cart' → The system adds the product to the shopping cart.
3. The system confirms the product has been added to the cart.
exception_flows: EF-1 (from Step 2): If the product is out of stock, the system displays an error message.
